trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Grove City
There were no other sightings in Grove City on or around June 12th 2012
divs: sighting detailssince having a sighting in my backyard over memorial day weekend, i have been watching the sky at night. i had observed the same pulsing\strobing star that floated over my neighborhood that weekend, now in the distance on several occassions. however, last night i saw something different. i observed some flasing lights over my treeline and called my boyfriend out, who also observed them. we then lost sight of them, so i went around to the front of the house to take a look. at this lime i saw an orange ball moving through the sky. it did not blink or make a sound. i watched it come across our entire block, but then it went behind a tree and never emerged on the other side. at which time we noticed an airplane in the direction the ball had been heading. we eventually went back inside, but i kept popping back out to check the skies. at one point i saw a flashing light dancing around the pulsing star that was in the distance. i called my boyfriend back out. the single light was then joined by two more flashing lights and they danced\flashed around for a few minuted until they lined up in a straight line directly below the pulsing star. this alignment seemed to cause a reaction in the star object of a bright red strobe. the small lights then moved off in seperate directions and disappeared. the pulsing star object became more distant.
Summary: Orange non blinking orb and seperate formation of white flashing lights w Starlike object
